name: Ham Smoker
description:
NOTE: As of now this is only a prototype, and is extremely barebones, as to demonstrate the core basic features. More updates are to come!

Ham Smoker, FOSS (Free and Open-Source Software) and developed on the Godot Engine, is a idle clicker game where you use your trusty Smoker to cook tasty Hams and use them to buy Smokers that cook for you!

You can find the game's source code at https://github.com/Alium-Realis/Ham-Smoker
